snippet: “50 Shades! The Musical — The Original Parody” at the Elektra Theater adds R-rated lyrics to E. L. James’s best-selling novel about bondage, but it keeps the nudity PG.
abstract: Andy Webster reviews musical 50 Shades! The Musical--The Original Parody at the Elektra Theater.
lead_paragraph: “50 Shades! The Musical — The Original Parody” at the Elektra Theater adds R-rated lyrics to E. L. James’s best-selling novel about bondage, but it keeps the nudity PG.
